quiz.question: Which platform started as a microblogging service with 280-character posts?
Which platform introduced native shopping tags for influencers to tag products?
Which measurement helps determine influencer ROI when tracking affiliate links?
Which common metric indicates followers interacting per post average?
What is an "earned media" outcome from influencer activity?
options: Unpaid organic coverage generated by influencers
quiz.answer: Unpaid organic coverage generated by influencers

quiz.question: Which year did TikTok merge global markets after ByteDance acquired Musical.ly?
What does "reach" refer to in social analytics?
options: Number of unique users who saw content
Number of images in a post
Total time spent editing a post
quiz.answer: Number of unique users who saw content

quiz.question: Which influencer category focuses on ultra-niche audiences with 1,000-10,000 followers?
Which measurement helps spot purchased engagement versus real interactions?
options: Low comment variety and repetitive usernames
quiz.answer: Low comment variety and repetitive usernames

quiz.question: Which platform popularized the vertical "Reels" format copying short videos?
Which format do many platforms prioritize algorithmically for higher distribution?
Which advanced fraud indicator flags when followers concentrate in suspicious geographies?
Which platform first popularized "influencer live shopping" at scale?
Which creative element tends to improve short-video completion rates?
options: Strong hook in the first seconds
quiz.answer: Strong hook in the first seconds

quiz.question: Which measurement represents the long-term benefit of influencer partnerships beyond immediate conversions?
options: Number of drafts saved by creators
Total hashtags used in a month
